## alpacon agent shutdown

Shutdown server's agent(alpamon)

```
alpacon agent shutdown [SERVER NAME] [flags]
```

### Examples

```
alpacon agent shutdown myserver
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for shutdown
```
